title: Crystal Palace star Andros Townsend explains why he has NEVER set foot inside a nightclub
text:
The party life has never been for Andros Townsend.

Being a Premier League footballer on astronomical wages, it can often come with the territory.

But Townsend has always tended to avoid nights out, and revealed on a new episode of Back of the Net his fundamental reasons why he has never actually stepped foot inside a nightclub.

Andros Townsend (L) revealed he has never been inside a nightclub on Back of the Net

'I just don't think that I would enjoy it very much,' the 28-year-old said.

'I'm not a drinker, I can't dance to save my life and, to be honest, I'm afraid of the dark.' Can't really argue with that.

Townsend, who began his career at Tottenham, has been a key figure in the Crystal Palace team since joining in 2016.

He has featured nine times this season and played the full 90 as Palace registered an impressive draw away at Arsenal on the weekend.

The Crystal Palace star spoke to Peter Crouch (M), Gabby Logan and John Bishop (R)

Townsend played the full 90 at the weekend as Palace secured an impressive point at Arsenal

In the same episode, which will be available on Amazon Prime on Tuesday evening, Townsend was joined by his former Tottenham team-mate Jermain Defoe, who spoke about how he almost became friends with Drake during his time at Toronto and revealed he would be interested in going on Strictly Come Dancing.

Rangers striker Defoe said: 'Strictly? I'd give it a go. Actually, I was once a secret dancer on a float at the Notting Hill Carnival… wearing a catsuit.'

Gabby Logan, Peter Crouch and comedian John Bishop are hosts of the weekly show, which release episodes every Tuesday.

On the same episode, Rangers star Jermain Defoe revealed he'd go on Strictly Come Dancing
description: Crystal Palace star Andros Townsend has always tended to avoid nights out, and revealed on a new episode of Back of the Net his fundamental reasons why.
